channel.title: Projects on Morja
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Morja

item.title: FLORA ADA
item.description: Flora Ada is a figure embraced by flowers, like a goddess of an (un)ordinary day.

item.title: A GARDEN OF FABRICS / VRTIČKANJE, PRTIČKANJE: DALJNOGLED award
item.description: In 2023, I received the DALJNOGLED 2023 award for my master’s thesis “A Garden of Fabrics/Vrtičkanje, Prtičkanje,” an honor given to young designers by the Designers Society of Slovenia.

item.title: A GARDEN OF FABRICS / VRTIČKANJE, PRTIČKANJE_editorial
item.description: A Garden of Fabrics is an artistic reflection on the contrasts of our everyday lives, presented as a reconstruction of the opposition between digital and handcrafted methods.

item.title: A GARDEN OF FABRICS / VRTIČKANJE, PRTIČKANJE
item.description: “A Garden of Fabrics" is a creative project blending digital and handcrafted textile elements.

item.title: A Walk Down Memory Lane
item.description: “For it doesn’t hurt to dream when the moon watches and glows.

item.title: A GARDEN OF FABRICS / VRTIČKANJE, PRTIČKANJE: LJFW & STYLO
item.description: October 2023 was eventful. I first presented my collection, A Garden of Fabrics, as part of the student showcase at Ljubljana Fashion Week in the ROG Center, where I received the award for the best student collection.

item.title: A GARDEN OF FABRICS / VRTIČKANJE, PRTIČKANJE: BIEN
item.description: A Garden of Fabrics is an artistic reflection on the contrasts of our everyday lives, presented as a reconstruction of the opposition between digital and handcrafted methods.

item.title: HANDKERCHIEFS
item.description: While doing my Erasmus+ exchange program at Design School Kolding in Denmark, one of the courses I did was Design for Change, which was divided into three parts.

item.title: LIFE IS A PALETTE OF COLORS
item.description: Watch a slow fashion film starring Špela Košir, Kresna Dara, Maja Gazvoda, Dana Rohkeus Verč, Zala Maja Ravnihar

item.title: FERTAH, ČIŽME, ČIBE, ŠKREBLNI
item.description: APRON, SHOES, CHICKENS AND DRIED APPLES This is a short story, maybe not even that.

item.title: 100 DAYS OF THE SEA
item.description: It’s been a while since I painted with a brush, so I grabbed my acrylic colours and with memories of my 2nd year of BA studies and the class of Colour theories, picked up some waste cardboard and papers from the corner of my studio and just started to create.

item.title: A WALK DOWN MEMORY LANE
item.description: ‘‘A walk down memory lane’’ is a story about dreams, longing, life and transience.

item.title: THE LIGHTNESS OF BEING
item.description: Story behind the photo series ‘‘The Lightness of Being’’ speaks of gifts; them being so precious that we take care of them by locking them away.

item.title: NANA x ZALA
item.description: Upcycled shirts for a better and greener tomorrow. Collection of 3 upcycled shirts made in collaboration with slovenian artist Nana Irgolič, who embroidered lovely illustrations on redesigned second hand shirts made by me.

item.title: ZLATICA
item.description: Meadow spreading down the valley. This is where I first learned to skii.

item.title: POPPY
item.description: When driving around countryside, I spot a steep hill full of poppies and fell in love with the red image.

item.title: ZLATKA
item.description: I finally managed to get some more sample waste materials, and a new patch sweater was made.

item.title: SREBRNA
item.description: Everytime my mom goes for a walk, she says she has to combine comfort with convenience.

item.title: ZALA
item.description: Beginning of the lockdown; I moved back home from Ljubljana.

item.title: LIGHT OF THE PAST
item.description: Life and surroundings shape every individual in a different way, I was shaped by living in a small village, in a 6-member family.

item.title: ŠPELA
item.description: Very often, when coming amid unknown people and learning someone is from the same area where I live, I feel connected to them by this fact, and I trust them slightly more than the others.

item.title: LOTI
item.description: Besides making one-of-a-kind out of second-hand and waste-textile garments, I love photography.

item.title: ELA
item.description: I love playing with light and shadow, with colour. And I love being around energic people, because their aura vibrates with your aura if you only let it.

item.title: ŠPELA BRINA
item.description: It was one day in October, the sun still shining bright and warm.

item.title: CVETKA
item.description: Cvetka represents a person who accepts the state of being unwanted, the stage of not belonging somewhere or to someone and still seeing through all of it, becoming something more.

item.title: ROZALIJA
item.description: Rozalija, inspired by colorful Salvation Mountain by Leonard Knight in California Desert Area, USA and clothing details and sillhuetes of the 50s, was designed as my 3rd years’ final collection as a student of Textile and fashion design at the Faculty of Natural Science and Engineering under the mentorship of prof.

item.title: MAJA
item.description: Second hand shirts getting a new chance, a new life for a better and greener tomorrow.

item.title: ENI OD SEDMIH MILIJARD
item.description: Eni od Sedmih Milijard is a Slovenian band creating indie-folk music; bringing people together, telling stories, sharing heart-warming melodies.

item.title: IVANA KOBILCA
item.description: IVANA KOBILCA In 2018 the National Gallery of Slovenia marked its 100th anniversary with an exhibition of life and work of Ivana Kobilca, one of the most famous Slovenian artists of all time.
